metadata.title: CVE-2024-1736 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions priorto 16.10.7, starting from 16.11 prior to 16.11.4, and starting from 17.0prior to 17.0.2. A vulnerability in GitLab's CI/CD pipeline editor couldallow for denial of service attacks through maliciously craftedconfiguration files.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
